report.monthly.civic-liker.title: Civic Liker Monthly Report
report.monthly.civic-liker.subscribers.d: You are supporting the follow creators by monthly subscription. Your billing date is {day} of each month. Click here to manage your subscription
report.monthly.civic-liker.supported.con: The creators got extra bonus from the Creators Fund because of your likes. You can check the details in Liker Land app.
report.monthly.writer.title: Monthly LikeCoin Reward Summary
referral-tx.title: Congratulation, you received referral rewards
referral-tx.description.referee:
You have installed Liker Land app with user's referral code.

You both received {amount} LikeCoin as rewards.
referral-tx.description.referrer:
user has installed Liker Land app because of you.

referral-tx.check-wallet: The rewards had been transferred to your wallet, you may open the Liker Land app and check.
